greetings: My name is Tomasz Sroka and this is my website. The idea behind the project was to make a simple single page website I could describe myself on. I've used Vue 3 to do so. You can toggle different colors in left menu, check my projects, hobbies or get to know me better going trough different tabs. You can also contact me via links included in contact tab. Enjoy your stay 😀
contact-form-header:
Do You need any further information?
Write your message bellow and send it directly to me 😀
lively-desc:
Specialists in the online world.
Constantly following and learning technological innovations to provide customers with only the best tools. Creating virtual reality, realizing every event.
tuoglos-desc: A group of 133 websites uniting Poles in the country and abroad.
